amendment.description: Amendments en bloc comprised of amendments 5, 6, and 7 printed in House Report 114-639. See page D750 of the Congressional Record of July 6, 2016 for description of en bloc amendments.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moore amendments (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 243 (Roll no. 361).

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A005) offered by Ms. Moore.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
